lead_paragraph: Belgium's injured defender Nicolas Lombaerts has been released from their Euro 2016 squad with Christian Kabasele called up by coach Marc Wilmots to bolster a weakened defence.

headline.print_headline: Belgium Drop Injured Lombaerts From Euro 2016 Squad
headline.main: Belgium Drop Injured Lombaerts From Euro 2016 Squad

snippet: Belgium's injured defender Nicolas Lombaerts has been released from their Euro 2016 squad with Christian Kabasele called up by coach Marc Wilmots to bolster a weakened defence....
